entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Vegreville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
